title: TANKMO Viable or not.
body: I was wondering if TANKMO is Viable now or not since I may start ranked again and quit being a bronze scrub for 3 years. Yes I know I play alot of normals and team builder and dont have the nuts to play ranked since I have a slight fear of playing ranked even though I'm Bronze 2. Disregard the shitty ADC Builds with the Essence Reavers was just testing to see how it would work. I can tell you that the matches I had were against 2 Rivens and Tryndamere in the picture above. Yes I know that Teemo counters them but I want to see some other people opinions about it.

replies.body: I won a game as AP rengar, quick LCS teams learn the pro strat.
Tank teemo new meta, kiddies and jelly haters gonna dislike!

It will definitely work better with enemy AD-based comps - he can certainly be a brutal split pusher with that kind of build against those comps. Without a solid AP threat, blind + high MS + frozen mallet + shrooms would be super frustrating to play against.

It depends what you mean in terms of viable though - certainly seems like it could be good in the right circumstances!

I have played it a few times in silver ranked games. Works ok just gotta make sure your not the real tank (he cant out tank a real tank vs like aoe and stuff). I've beaten jayce's and other champions with it who should rape a teemo. Although i usually build it different to you as more of an ap or hybrid bruiser. The one problem with it is he loses alot of his ability to assasinate someone.
I honestly think AP Teemo is more viable often, but I think Tankmo is a good idea if it allows you to battle your counters. So maybe it could be a situational thing.

So, you a Satan worshipper?

Oh I will find you, and I will hunt you down you hear me?
